snippet: A federal judge said that a suit filed by New York Progress and Protection PAC, which backs Joseph J. Lhota’s mayoral bid, would be disruptive so close to the election.
abstract: Judge Paul A Grotty of Federal District Court in Manhattan rejects bid by conservative group New York Progress and Protection PAC, supporting New York City mayoral candidate Joseph J Lhota,  to accept unlimited contributions; rules it would be too disruptive to change New York's campaign fund-raising laws less than three weeks before Election Day.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge said that a suit filed by New York Progress and Protection PAC, which backs Joseph J. Lhota’s mayoral bid, would be disruptive so close to the election.

headline.main: U.S. Judge Denies Bid by Lhota Supporters to Accept Unlimited Donations
headline.print_headline: U.S. Judge Denies Bid by Lhota Supporters to Accept Unlimited Donations

keywords.value: New York Progress and Protection PAC
keywords.name: organizations
